message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. I believe this split reflects the fact that the money loses value faster for you.
I appreciate your fairness, Alice. But I believe my proposal reflects the current inflation rates more accurately. Let's see if we can find common ground.
Bob, your offer significantly undervalues my position. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. Time is running out, and this deal makes sense for both of us.
